extendedInfo.description: Practice your ear, music theory and sight reading skills with this portable and easy-to-use training program. Perfect for students in introductory music theory courses.Challenge your abilities with five different exercises:-Note Identification-Chord Identification-Major Key Signature Identification-Generic Interval Identification-Specific Interval IdentificationCustomize with three different clef configurations:-Treble clef only-Bass clef only-Mixed clefsTrack your progress with a built-in grading system.Problems are randomly generated for depth of learning.If you find a bug or the app does not run on your phone, please contact me and I will fix the issue ASAP.Based on the exercises provided at http://www.musictheory.netFuture developments:-Alto and tenor clefs for viola players, cellists, etc.-Advanced sight-reading exercises such as Minor Key Identification, etc.-Ear training exercises such as Scale Ear Training, Interval Ear Training, etc.

reviews.title: Best note identification app..
reviews.comment: However I\'d really like to see the option to replay the tones, and for them to play longer, creating a better consonance between notes.     Also chord training in specific keys would be a definite plus, pushing this App well beyond the others.
reviews.author: Adam McLean

reviews.title: Great stuff
reviews.comment: This is a very good application for learning to read music. There are some features that can make this application go from \"flash card\" replacement to an actual interactive experience but this is just for a visionary perspective. Definitely worth the download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: There at free note training apps. Iw was mainly interested in the chord identifier, but not being able to specify which keys to train was a little disappointing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Highly recommended for beginners. The simple approach is great for  new students!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Use this to learn notes, keys, chords etc. Really good app.
reviews.author: Eric Hay

reviews.comment: Great for simple but effective practice
reviews.author: A Google User
